CustomObject.description:
Used to store the OAuth token for the Trailhead API To derive it:
Ensure you have Python 3.6 installed and have installed requests using pip3 Change to the folder that has the script "oauth3_login.py" in it. On Stephen's MacBook Air it is in "/Users/stephen,stanley/Google Drive/Documents/Personal"
(copy and execute this command to go straight there:)
$ cd "/Users/stephen.stanley/Google Drive/Documents/Personal"
MAKE SURE YOU ARE ON THE VPN
use this command:
$ python3 oauth3_login.py
Enter your username and password when prompted
On this custom setting, click on "Manage", then "Edit" and paste the entire string after the word Bearer following the line "access_token", completely replacing the existing string value
